txt.en: Londir can be found in Minas Tirith.\n\nSpeak with Londir.
'Thank you for assisting Ingold. While the northern gate of the Rammas remains safe for now, I can only hope Ingold's post does not fall into the hands of the enemy.'
'Good to see you again, [placeholder]. There is much I need help with.'
Complete Quest: Retaking the Northern Rammas
Ingold can be found at the northern gate of the Rammas.\n\nYou should speak with Ingold and assist him with protecting the Rammas.
Ingold can be found at the northern gate of the Rammas.\n\nYou should speak with Ingold and assist him with protecting the Rammas.

'I have been working with Curugond on repairs to the Rammas Echor up until the Morgul-host took the Causeway Forts.

'Have you met Ingold, the captain of the Out-wall? He is doing his best to keep the Rammas Echor intact. I would like to repair the Rammas at this very moment, if I could. Alas, I am needed here to repair the city.

'Would you be so kind as to travel to Ingold at the North-gate and assist him with his defence of the Rammas?'
Londir asks you to assist Ingold, the captain of the Out-wall, in keeping the Rammas Echor intact.
